sentences.english: Conflicts in its north Caucasus republics have flared again.
sentences.chinese: 北高加索共和国地区的冲突硝烟又起。

sentences.english: Smoke curled over the burning wreckage.
sentences.chinese: 硝烟弥漫在燃烧的残船上。

sentences.english: By that I mean they want to bring about the peaceful evolution of socialist countries towards capitalism.
sentences.chinese: 所谓没有硝烟，就是要社会主义国家和平演变。

sentences.english: The log-house was full of smoke, to which we owed our comparative safety.
sentences.chinese: 木屋里弥漫着硝烟，多亏了这，我们还算安全些。

sentences.english: Just like refugees, oppressors often flee at the end of conflict.
sentences.chinese: 与难民类似，这些压迫者经常逃到远离硝烟的地方。

sentences.english: Smoke caused by explosions rises over Gaza City.
sentences.chinese: 爆炸引起的硝烟在加沙城上空腾起。

sentences.english: Their search is the last gasp of the post-war hunt for Nazi war criminals.
sentences.chinese: 警方的搜捕表明战后抓捕纳粹战犯的硝烟未散。
